title: How to Watch Movies Using Telnet

steps.title: Make sure you are connected to the internet.
steps.content: Make sure you are connected to the internet.

steps.title: Open the Start Menu.
steps.content: Open the Start Menu .

steps.title: Click on 'Run'.
steps.content: Click on 'Run'. (You can also open Run by pressing WinKey + R.)

steps.title: Type cmd.exe, and press OK.
steps.content: Type cmd.exe, and press OK.

steps.title: In the window that opens up, type in "telnet towel.blinkenlights.nl" without the quotes, and hit enter or in first line enter "o" without quotes and in second line type towel.blinkenlights.nl then hit enter (source computer.
steps.content: In the window that opens up, type in "telnet towel.blinkenlights.nl" without the quotes, and hit enter or in first line enter "o" without quotes and in second line type towel.blinkenlights.nl then hit enter (source computer. Wizard .tk)

steps.title: It may take a minute to connect, but soon it will play Star Wars Episode IV in ASCII.
steps.content: It may take a minute to connect, but soon it will play Star Wars Episode IV in ASCII.

steps.title: Note:
steps.content: Note: This is not a hidden movie in Windows. You are using a program called telnet and connecting a server called towel.blinkenlights.nl. Once connected, the server plays the movie (an ASCII art animation).

steps.title: Make sure you are connected to the internet.
steps.content: Make sure you are connected to the internet.

steps.title: Go to Control Panel › Programs › Turn Windows Feature On or Off and check both telnet boxes to turn telnet on.
steps.content: Go to Control Panel › Programs › Turn Windows Feature On or Off and check both telnet boxes to turn telnet on. On newer versions of Windows, telnet is turned off by default.

steps.title: Open up the "Start" menu and go to "search".
steps.content: Open up the "Start" menu and go to "search".

steps.title: Type in "telnet" and press Enter.
steps.content: Type in "telnet" and press Enter.

steps.title: In the following window, type "o" (type this without quotes) and press Enter.
steps.content: In the following window, type "o" (type this without quotes) and press Enter.

steps.title: Now type "towel.blinkenlights.nl" (again, without quotes) and press enter.
steps.content: Now type "towel.blinkenlights.nl" (again, without quotes) and press enter. Note: you can now turn telnet off.

steps.title: Make sure you are connected to the internet.
steps.content: Make sure you are connected to the internet.

steps.title: Open your "applications" folder.
steps.content: Open your "applications" folder.

steps.title: Locate and open the "utilities" folder.
steps.content: Locate and open the "utilities" folder.

steps.title: Open the application "terminal".
steps.content: Open the application "terminal".

steps.title: Type in "telnet towel.blinkenlights.nl" (without the quotes) and press Enter.
steps.content: Type in "telnet towel.blinkenlights.nl" (without the quotes) and press Enter. Your text art version of Star Wars Episode IV will now start.

steps.title: Make sure you are connected to the internet.
steps.content: Make sure you are connected to the internet.

steps.title: Open the application "terminal".
steps.content: Open the application "terminal".

steps.title: Type in "telnet towel.blinkenlights.nl" (without the quotes) and press Enter.
steps.content: Type in "telnet towel.blinkenlights.nl" (without the quotes) and press Enter. Your text art version of Star Wars Episode IV will now start.
